ValidationRule.description: Checks that the user has selected an status for power of attorney
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName ="Order_Fulfilment_Case" && (ISPICKVAL(Type, "Voice") || ISPICKVAL(Type, "Combination of products")) && ISBLANK( TEXT( Power_of_attorney__c )) && TEXT(Status) <> "Front Office" && TEXT(Status) <> "Gather Information" && TEXT(Status) <> "Sales Enrichment"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify the status of POA
